abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau's new liberal government plans to roll out budget to address country's flagging economy that will include significant increase in deficit spending.
lead_paragraph: Canada’s new Liberal government will try to revive a flagging economy with one of the country’s biggest deficits since the 2008 financial crisis.

headline.main: Canada: Government Budget Will Seek Significant Increase in Deficit Spending
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Government Budget Will Seek Significant Increase in Deficit Spending

snippet: Canada’s new Liberal government will try to revive a flagging economy with one of the country’s biggest deficits since the 2008 financial crisis.
